snippet: MINKOW--Jerome "Jerry", 89, lost his battle with cancer on March 2nd. He knew none of us has forever, and he didn't waste a minute. He is survived by his loving wife Pamela Geiger, his brother Ed Minkow, and his nephews Andrew and Alex Minkow. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MINKOW--Jerome "Jerry", 89, lost his battle with cancer on March 2nd. He knew none of us has forever, and he didn't waste a minute. He is survived by his loving wife Pamela Geiger, his brother Ed Minkow, and his nephews Andrew and Alex Minkow. 1/3
